type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.component.ComponentSelector
type.description: * Represents some opaque criteria used to select a component instance during dependency resolution. Various sub-interfaces * expose specific details about the criteria. * * @since 1.10

method.name: getDisplayName
method.description: * Returns a human-consumable display name for this selector. * * @return Display name * @since 1.10

method.name: matchesStrictly
method.description: * Checks if selector matches component identifier. * * @param identifier Component identifier * @return if this selector matches exactly the given component identifier. * @since 1.10

property.name: displayName
property.description: * Returns a human-consumable display name for this selector. * * @return Display name * @since 1.10
